If you do, look at up to four cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Come… with… me!

name: "Outstretched Hand" Rider of Black
ability: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if a card named "Master's Command" is in your climax area, this card gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, you may return this card to your hand." Then, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Master》 or 《Servant》 or 《Homunculus》 character, put it into your hand. (If it is not, return the revealed card to its original place)
flavor_text: Live! You are qualified to do so.

name: "Unleashing the True Name" Rider of Black
ability: 【CONT】 If a card named ""Outstretched Hand" Rider of Black" is in your clock, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.
【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, if this card is on your center stage, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +4000 power.
flavor_text: For me to unleash the True Name, I need Master to supply the magical energy.

name: "Massacre" Assassin of Black
ability: 【CONT】 During this card's battle, all players cannot play "Backup" from hand.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to two cards, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
【AUTO】 [Put two cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal one damage to your opponent. (This damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: Mommy, I'm hungry!

name: "Battle Ready" Berserker of Black
ability: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack.

【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, your opponent may draw a card. If your opponent does, your opponent chooses a card in your opponent's hand, and puts it into his or her waiting room.
flavor_text: Uhh...?

name: "Savagery" Assassin of Black
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.

name: Fiore Forvedge Yggdmillennia
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to one 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: After the preparations, we will use a plane to raid the Hanging Gardens!

name: "Growl" Berserker of Black
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters you have.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Blasted Tree" is in your climax area, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn, and at the end of this card's attack, put this card into your memory, and put the top three cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax revealed among those cards, choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Uuuhhhh…….!

name: "Duel" Archer of Black
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put a 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character from your hand into your waiting room & Put a face up card in your level face down] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card’s battle opponent is higher than your opponent’s level, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.

name: "Divine Blade" Saber of Black
